name: Seventh Supper (Cold Evening)
description:
SUMMARY: To be the apprentice of Sephiroth is only the highest honor that you must accept with love and gratitude, no matter what.

[Sephiroth x Fem!Reader]

This is a yandere interactive fanfiction for Sephiroth I'm creating purely for my enjoyment, but I know others would be interested in it too so I decided to make this page. 

THE GAME IS STILL IN DEVELOPMENT AND IS IN ITS BETA STAGE.
